author: Khaleda Rahman
title: Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer Is Being Sued Over Stay-at-Home Order
description: Residents filed a lawsuit claiming the restrictions imposed by the stay-at-home order violate their constitutional rights.
content:
Michigan Governor Gretchen Whitmer is being sued over the coronavirus pandemic stay-at-home order issued in a state with one of the highest infection rates nationwide.
The state's "Stay Home, Stay Safe" executive order, in place until May 1, instructs Michig… [+6799 chars]
